data.text: @SyntheticPol Constantly turning restrictions on and off also cause confusion and division and also challenges for businesses.
@SyntheticPol Cases ARE beginning to spike again, not here quite yet because BA.2 just started picking up in the Americas but removing restrictions now would just add 100ft to the incoming wave.

@acurrie254 started a few weeks ago I believe. Funny fact is at current growth rates, they'll surpass BC's covid numbers within 10 days.

BC winning
@AceOxv If cases spike again we always have the opportunity to bring restrictions back.
@PMalfurious @SyntheticPol I'm sorry to hear about your neighbour, but anecdotes don't disprove data my dude.
@SyntheticPol I don't want the restrictions to stay, nobody does, but if we let it loose now our hospitals will collapse, that's a lot worse then having to deal with restrictions.
@SyntheticPol woah when did NZ get hit with a huge covid wave, heard nothing about this
